text: Nitrogen trichloride is a chemical compound. It contains nitrogen in its -3 oxidation state. It contains nitrogen and chloride ions. Its chemical formula is NCl3. It is an explosive. It is made by reacting ammonium compounds with chlorine. It reacts with hot water to release hypochlorous acid and ammonia. ==Related pages== *Nitrogen triiodide *Ammonium chloride *Nitrate Category:Nitrogen compounds Category:Chlorides
title: Nitrogen trichloride
